chapter.title: Ping Query
chapter.para: A ping query can be used to check the connection to the Solr server and the health of the Solr server. It's not just a network ping, it will execute a query to check Solr health. You can set this query in the Solr config with the 'pingQuery' directive.
chapter.caution: It's not advisable to check Solr with a ping before every request, this can have a big performance import. You are better of using the ping query with intervals, or as a check after a query error to see if the query was faulty or if Solr has problems.

sect1.title: The result of a ping query
sect1.para: A ping query has no useful result. If you don't get an exception the ping request was succesful.
